channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US tests radar that could link into Golden Dome to detect China, Russia threats
More than a dozen killed in southern Gaza after Israel opens fire near aid distribution point, officials and witnesses say
2 Florida men are accused of stealing millions from trust fund for people with special needs
'Dear Donald.' Trump posts fawning private text from NATO chief on social media
‘The View’: Former Prosecutor Sunny Hostin Says Diddy Jury ‘Doesn’t Seem to Be Buying What the Prosecution Is Selling’
Tropical Storm Andrea, first of Atlantic hurricane season, has formed
item.description: The National Hurricane Center says Tropical Storm Andrea has formed in the Atlantic Ocean

item.title: Wisconsin top court delivers win for environmentalists in 'forever chemicals' fight
item.description: The Wisconsin Supreme Court has delivered a victory for environmentalists in the battle over the regulation of “forever chemicals” known as PFAS

item.title: 4 charged with hate crimes for destroying LGBTQ+ pride flags, Atlanta police say
item.description: Atlanta police say they’re charging three men and a juvenile with hate crimes for pulling down LGBTQ+ pride flags and cutting them up

item.title: Minnesota lawmaker shot to death at home to lie in state at Capitol ahead of funeral

item.title: Sen. Grassley calls delays at a benefits program for deceased officers 'absolutely unacceptable'
